about.title: Spayka Air Cargo Solutions B.V.
about.tagline: Express without compromise. European logistics done right.
about.whoWeAreText: Netherlands-based logistics company specializing in express and time-critical cargo solutions across Europe. Operating 24/7 with speed without chaos.
about.whatWeDoText: End-to-end logistics from vans to full air cargo solutions
about.equipmentText: Rollerbed trailers optimized for PMC air cargo units — fast handling, reduced loading times, maximum safety
about.missionText: To deliver reliable, high-speed cargo solutions across Europe by combining smart logistics, dedicated equipment, and nonstop support — without unnecessary complexity.

services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions across

services.seaFreightDesc: Cost-effective ocean freight for large volume shipments

services.b2bDesc: Tailored logistics for businesses and consumers

whyUs.title: We Don't Compete on Promises
whyUs.subtitle: We compete on execution

speed.title: Speed
speed.subtitle: Time-critical means time-critical
speed.description: Express delivery without compromise. When every minute counts, our dedicated fleet and 24/7 operations ensure your cargo moves at the pace your business demands.

price.title: Price
price.subtitle: Competitive, transparent, no surprises
price.description: Fair pricing with complete transparency. No hidden fees, no unexpected costs — just honest logistics at rates that make business sense.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Real people, real answers, 24/7
support.description: Nonstop customer support from experienced logistics professionals. Direct communication, immediate responses, and solutions when you need them most.

whyUs.tagline: Express without compromise • Speed. Control. Reliability.
